name: Zagan Warrior (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: John Airey - Bug-Byte. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Accelerate until you are given the green lightto fire. Destroy the Tycons and their Mother Ship. Dodge the crystals - they wreak havoc on your mega speed Zagan chaser. Fire, fire.

You can only fire at full speed. The tycons appear in waves.

Start the game: START
Left/Right: Cursor key Left/Right
Speed: Cursor keys Up/Down
Fire: A,B
Reset: Select

Start the game: ENTER
Left/Right: Arrow keys Left/Right
Speed: Cursor keys Up/Down
Fire: Z,X
Reset: Shift
